013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.ConstraintTarget;
020    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
021    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
022    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
023    
024    /**
025     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
026     */
027    public class RangeCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<Range>
028    {
029            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
030    
031            private double min = Double.MIN_VALUE;
032            private double max = Double.MAX_VALUE;
033    
034            /**
035             * {@inheritDoc}
036             */
037            @Override
038            public void configure(final Range constraintAnnotation)
039            {
040                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
041                    setMax(constraintAnnotation.max());
042                    setMin(constraintAnnotation.min());
043            }
044    
045            /**
046             * {@inheritDoc}
047             */
048            protected ConstraintTarget[] getAppliesToDefault()
049            {
050                    return new ConstraintTarget[]{ConstraintTarget.VALUES};
051            }
052            
053            /**
054             * @return the max
055             */
056            public double getMax()
057            {
058                    return max;
059            }
060    
061            /**
062             * @return the min
063             */
064            public double getMin()
065            {
066                    return min;
067            }
068    
069            /**
070             * {@inheritDoc}
071             */
072            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
073                            final Validator validator)
074            {
075                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
076    
077                    if (valueToValidate instanceof Number)
078                    {
079                            final double doubleValue = ((Number) valueToValidate).doubleValue();
080                            return doubleValue >= min && doubleValue <= max;
081                    }
082    
083                    final String stringValue = valueToValidate.toString();
084                    try
085                    {
086                            final double doubleValue = Double.parseDouble(stringValue);
087                            return doubleValue >= min && doubleValue <= max;
088                    }
089                    catch (final NumberFormatException e)
090                    {
091                            return false;
092                    }
093            }
094    
095            /**
096             * @param max the max to set
097             */
098            public void setMax(final double max)
099            {
100                    this.max = max;
101                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
102            }
103    
104            /**
105             * @param min the min to set
106             */
107            public void setMin(final double min)
108            {
109                    this.min = min;
110                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
111            }
112    
113            /**
114             * {@inheritDoc}
115             */
116            @Override
117            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
118            {
119                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
120                    messageVariables.put("max", Double.toString(max));
121                    messageVariables.put("min", Double.toString(min));
122                    return messageVariables;
123            }
124    }
